articles.title: Call of Duty: Sony signs 10-year deal with Microsoft to keep COD on Playstation - Technext
articles.description: Microsoft and Sony have signed a 10-year "binding agreement" to keep Call of Duty on PlayStation following the Xbox maker’s acquisition of Activision Blizzard as confirmed by Microsoft Gaming CEO Phil Spencer.

articles.title: Microsoft Looks to Extend Activision Blizzard Deal Deadline: Report - Barron's
articles.description: The tech giant wants to extend the contract for its $69 billion acquisition of the videogame company, which is due to expire on Tuesday, Reuters reported.

articles.title: MASSIVE solar flare blasts out high-speed CME, NASA satellite shows; Solar storm set to strike soon - HT Tech
